issue.title: [CF 833] Language Bug German -> English
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.260, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1

Installed Version

6.2.1

Description

For example I wanna track the Cooldown of my Spell "Mortal Strike" so i'll write that Spell's Name in German Language => "Tödlicher Stoß" but it's not working like this. Game is in German and if I wanna configure TellMeWhen I have to do this in english. How does it work to type in Spells in german instead of english, can I change that?

Installed Addons

_NPCScan - _NPCScan 5.0.0.5 Addon Control Panel - 3.4.3 AtlasLoot Enhanced - v7.06.00 Bagnon - 5.3.4 Bartender4 - 4.5.10 BigWigs Bossmods - r10959-release Coordinates - 1.10 DBM-RaidTools (Deadly Boss Mods) - DBM-RaidLeadTools-v4-r113 Deadly Boss Mods - 5.3.3 Deadly Boss Mods - Cataclysm mods - Cataclysm Mods r65 EnergyWatch Reborn - 5.3.0 ErrorFilter - v2.8 MikScrollingBattleText - v5.7.129 MoveAnything - 13.6.1 NugComboBar - 5.2.6 OmniCC - 5.3.1 Postal - v3.5.1 Recount - v5.3.0a release ReforgeLite - v1.32 TellMeWhen - 6.2.1 VuhDo - VuhDo 3.44 XPBarNone - 50300-1

comments.body:
If you are seeing the suggestion list entries in English then that is because the cache was created when you started the game and first loaded TMW as English. To reset it, exit the game and delete TellMeWhen_Options.lua from World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/ACCOUNT NAME/Saved Variables

You should still enter your spell names as German if you are playing on a German client. The suggestion list won't work properly, but that doesn't really matter as long as you know the names of your spell - the suggestion list is just there to make input quicker and easier, but you don't have to use it.

I will look into writing some code that will make sure that there won't be suggestion list language mismatches in the future.

Edited Jun 29, 2013
